CSS-Basics
format:
<style>
    * {
        background: none;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
    }

    root, a, button, p, div {
        -webkit-user-select: none !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.2) !important;
        border: none !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /*        box-shadow: 0 3px 6px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19) !important;
    */
    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel>div>md-card {
        background: none !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel button {
        background: none !important;
    }

    p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        text-align: center !important;
    }


    button, html, input, select, textarea  {
        font-family: Roboto, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif;
    }

    md-toolbar {
        background: none !important;
    }

    md-sidenav {
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, rgba(40, 42, 49, 0.90) 20%, rgba(47, 49, 56, 0.90) 80%) !important;
    }

    md-card.nr-dashboard-button * {
        background: none !important;
        box-shadow: none !important;
    }

    md-card.nr-dashboard-template * {
        background: none !important;
    }


    body {
        background: transparent;
        
        background: linear-gradient(
            45deg,
            #9900d3,
            #4b0082,
            #8a2be2,
            #4169e1,
            #ffff00
        );
        
        width: 100%;
        height: 100vh;
        background-size: 200% 200% !important;/*サイズを大きくひきのばす*/
        background-position: 0% 50%;
        animation: bggradient 10s ease infinite;
        
        -webkit-touch-callout: none !important;
        color: #ffffff !important;
        padding-top:5px !important;
    }
        
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {}
    
    @keyframes bggradient{
        0% {
            background-position: 0% 50%;
        }
        25%{
            background-position: 50% 100%;
        }
        50% {
            background-position: 100% 50%;
        }
        75%{
            background-position: 50% 100%;
        }
        100% {
            background-position: 0% 50%;
        }
    }
    
    .nr-dashboard-cardpanel > p {
        max-height: 32px;
        min-height: 32px;
        margin-left: 6px !important;
        margin-right: 6px !important;
        margin-top: 10px;
        margin-bottom: 12px;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: larger;
    }

    button.md-raised.nr-dashboard-form-button.md-button.md-ink-ripple {
        border-radius: 20px;
    }
    
    .nr-dashboard-template {
        padding: 0px;
    }

    .test {
        text-align: center;
    }

    // UI 最終調整
    #Application_status_cards {
        height: 100px !important;
    }
    // UI 調整終了
    
</style>

template:
<style>
    * {
        background: none;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
    }

    root,
    a,
    button,
    p,
    div {
        -webkit-user-select: none !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.2) !important;
        border: none !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        /*        box-shadow: 0 3px 6px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19) !important;
    */
    }
    
    p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        text-align: center !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel>div>md-card {
        background: none !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel button {
        background: none !important;
    }

    md-toolbar {
        background: none !important;
    }

    md-sidenav {
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, rgba(40, 42, 49, 0.90) 20%, rgba(47, 49, 56, 0.90) 80%) !important;
    }

    md-card.nr-dashboard-button * {
        background: none !important;
        box-shadow: none !important;
    }

    md-card.nr-dashboard-template * {
        background: none !important;
    }


    body {
        background: transparent;

        background: linear-gradient(
            45deg,
            {{payload_1}},
            {{payload_2}},
            {{payload_3}},
            {{payload_4}}
        );

        width: 100%;
        height: 100vh;
        background-size: 200% 200% !important;
        /*サイズを大きくひきのばす*/
        background-position: 0% 50%;
        animation: bggradient 30s ease infinite;

        -webkit-touch-callout: none !important;
        color: #ffffff !important;
        padding-top: 5px !important;
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {}

    @keyframes bggradient {
        0% {
            background-position: 0% 50%;
        }

        25% {
            background-position: 50% 100%;
        }

        50% {
            background-position: 100% 50%;
        }

        75% {
            background-position: 50% 100%;
        }

        100% {
            background-position: 0% 50%;
        }
    }
    .nr-dashboard-cardpanel > p {
        max-height: 32px;
        min-height: 32px;
        margin-left: 6px !important;
        margin-right: 6px !important;
        margin-top: 10px;
        margin-bottom: 12px;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: larger;
    }

    button.md-raised.nr-dashboard-form-button.md-button.md-ink-ripple {
        border-radius: 20px;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-template {
        padding: 0px;
    }

    .test {
        text-align: center;
    }

</style>

msg.co2 = msg.environment['co2']

msg.flowerTable = msg.payload

name: function 25
func:
let status = msg.status

if (status = 0) msg.icon = "bubble_chart"
if (status = 1) msg.icon = "expand_more"
if (status = 2) msg.icon = "arrow_downward"
if (status = 3) msg.icon = "nature"
if (status = 4) msg.icon = "spa"
if (status = 5) msg.icon = "local_florist"

return msg;
